WHY DO WE SPONSOR A CHILD.

Child sponsorship transforms the lives of vulnerable children, with 40 USD per month children will receive; A primary and secondary school education Basic medical care. Spiritual( Christ-centered training) and Scholastic materials When you come to sponsor these children at this critical stage,. You save them from perishing and we believe that these children will go back into the communities and the entire nation for the glory of God.

About Us

We started in November 2018 with an aim of helping the communities in both sociality, economically and health developments.
